Protection_Status: K494 - Profitis Ilias (Damarionou Naxou)  [Wildlife Refuge]: OGG 659/Β/1979|GR4220026 - Naxos: Ori Anathematistra, Koronos, Mavrovouni, Zas, Viglatouri (Special Protection Area): Law 3937/2011 (OGG/Α 60/31.03.2011), Joint Ministerial Decision 50743/2017 (OGG 4432/B/15.12.17)

Cave_Description: The location of the cave is unknown. It was cited by Hirst (1922) as the site where the parasitic mite Liponyssus sternalis (=Macronyssus rhinolophi) was collected from a bat: "Host: A bat found in a cave near Lake Beshik, Salonika (27.17.1918), Dr James Waterston."
